## 8.0.0 - 2020/10/6

- move shared logic to `dom-shared`
- Breaking change for Node.js consumers: export `getCaptureDom`, `getCaptureDomPoll`, `getPollResult`, `getCaptureDomForIE`, `getCaptureDomPollForIE`, `getPollResultForIE`

## 7.1.4
